topic.title: Print Document Within the Author Component

section.title: Question
section.p: Can a document be printed within the Author Component?

section.title: Answer
section.p: You can use the following API method to either print the Author document content to the printer or to show the Print Preview dialog box, depending on the preview parameter value:AuthorComponentProvider.print(boolean preview)Here is the online Javadoc for this method: http://www.oxygenxml.com/InstData/Editor/SDK/javadoc/ro/sync/ecss/extensions/api/component/AuthorComponentProvider.html#print(boolean)
